message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I believe this reflects its worth, but I'm open to discussing further.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While your offer is tempting, I'm aiming for a price closer to my initial offer. Would you consider $18,500?
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $16,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I'm trying to find a price that works for both of us. How about we split the difference and agree on $17,500? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
